sentence: It was updated a few years ago but you can still tell it is an older resort
I asked if we could move rooms and was informed that if maintenance could not fix the problems they would consider moving us
The hotel is old and is desperate need of a reno
They are ok bathrooms seriously need an upgrading
from a frequent guest to the ownership for the price to stay at this property necessary renovations should be assessed to give guests the full experience prior to the run down facilities
Pillows sucked and bathroom could do with a refresh shower leaked tiles were getting a bit cracked and old
The badThe rooms are dated and need to be renovated
The resort was undergoing some renovation during our stay
I booked through SPG and they were not aware of the renovations
We had an un renovated room and it is showing it is age
Incredible stay in a beautifully updated room
Great romsrecent renovations
The best way to describe stay is that the staff did the best they could with what they had to work with The resort is in the middle of remodel
Oh one more thing despite the place being built in the early 1960s our room was great and recently renovated
The suite we were upgraded to was recently renovated and was a very large one bedroom suite
The original buildings circa 1963 feature really cool architecture that with a pile of money for renovation could make the Sheraton Maui a stellar property

Good location snorkeling BlackRock pleasant staff renovated rooms sunset walking distance to Whalers Bad resort is disjointed very long walks and elevator rides to lobby beach housekeeping was spotty bugs not enough shade around pool guests reserving chairs rowdy kids in pool
Rooms are updated featuring modern fixtures in the bathrooms and nice cold rooms to escape the summer heat

This resort has a to die for location wonderful waitresses and waiters great massage therapists and thorough housekeepers but absolutely no regard for preserving the guest experience in the face of ongoing major renovations and insultingly dismissive customer service by guest services staff
They have recently redone the entire facility and it is beyond beautiful
